title: Wake Up, Girls! Shin Shou (Wake Up, Girls! New Chapter)
synopsis: Wake Up, Girls! is the story of growth and friendship of seven girls living in Sendai, Miyagi who form the idol group "Wake Up, Girls! (WUG)" and work together to become top idols.
characters: ['Shimada, Mayu', 'Okamoto, Miyu', 'Katayama, Minami', 'Nanase, Yoshino', 'Kikuma, Kaya', 'Hisami, Nanami', 'Hayashida, Airi', 'Atsugi, Itsuka', 'Hayashi, Ayumi', 'Morishima, Otome']
voices: ['Yoshioka, Mayu', 'Takagi, Miyu', 'Tanaka, Minami', 'Aoyama, Yoshino', 'Okuno, Kaya', 'Yamashita, Nanami', 'Eino, Airi', 'Atsugi, Nanami', 'Hayashi, Koko', 'Morishima, Yuuka']
